casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Steven C. WILSON. No. 275P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of June 2007 by Defendant for "Writ of Certiorari and/or In the Alternative Petition for Writ of Error Coram Nobis":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
